content.raw:
I managed to reproduce the problem. 52b85d3 should fix it. Could you give it another try?

As a side note, I didn't manage to compile Ign Transport with cmake 3.5 on Windows 10. I had to install cmake 3.2.2 . I believe the FindProtobuf that is shipped with cmake 3.5 expects a different file structure than the one provided with our zipped protobuf version.
content.html:
I managed to reproduce the problem. 52b85d3 should fix it. Could you give it another try?

As a side note, I didn't manage to compile Ign Transport with cmake 3.5 on Windows 10. I had to install cmake 3.2.2 . I believe the FindProtobuf that is shipped with cmake 3.5 expects a different file structure than the one provided with our zipped protobuf version.
